name: Norwegian Association Against Noise
membership:
Noregian association for health and environment
Network with other organisations Bellona, Friends of the Earth, Naturvernforbundet, Norwegian acoustic association
goal:
The Norwegian Association Against Noise, founded in 1963, is a politically independent environmental organization receiving financial support from the Ministry of Environment/The Norwegian Climate and Pollution Agency.
Our goal is to prevent and reduce environmental noise, contribute to better quality of life, and improve health, by participating in public hearings, national information campaigns and advisory to the local authorities and public in general.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Culture and media, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Environmental noise directive, regulations concerning car industry, other mobility poducts, transport, house qualities, area plans, environmental noise legislation regarding all issues that affects daily life
